In England, in the seven days to 08 April, there were 15,403 new confirmed cases (27.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 April, there were 22,994 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 33% (7,591 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 April is 3,824,441 (6,794.5 cases per 100,000 population).
